Lyons is a Statutory Town in Boulder County, Colorado, United States.
Fly in to Denver, Take Pena to E-470 West (toll road) to I-25 North to 66 West past Longmont.
Walk, drive, ride the bus- It is a pretty small town, only 1.2 square miles or 3.108 square kilometers.
Redstone Museum, Rockygrass Festival, Lyons Outdoor Games.
Oskar Blues, Smokin' Daves, The Barking Dog Cafe, The Stone Cup Cafe, Nepal's Cafe, Lyons Dairy Bar, The Old ChubWay, The Fork, Dave's Diner, Julie's Thai, The Soda Fountain.
Steamboat Mountain Lodge, Aspen Leaf Motel, Ferg's Inn.

http://townoflyons.com

Rocky Mountain National Park, Estes Park, Allen's Park, Nederland, Boulder, Longmont, Denver.
